title: 3 and Out - Khalil Mack Trade, Rodgers Return vs. Russ Exit, Wentz Red Flags, Aikman MNF Move, News & Notes
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Khalil Mack Trade, Rodgers Return vs. Russ Exit, Wentz Red Flags, Aikman MNF Move, News & Notes
description:
John discusses the Bears trading Khalil Mack to the Chargers, how much he can immediately improve the Chargers, what it could mean for Justin Fields career, how Aaron Rodgers and Russell Wilson handled their situations differently, why they are both divas, if Denver is really a lock to be an AFC contender, why teams are so willing to move on from Carson Wentz, and if it was smart for Fox to let Troy Aikman walk split for MNF.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
